c74object.name: abc.mc.harmo~
c74object.description:
abc.mc.harmo~ provides a multichannel harmonizer. There are n parallel harmonizers, each having its own input and own output.
Each harmonizer has got an individual gain: gain0, gain1, gain2, etc. in dB (between -127 and +18) and a transposition coefficient: trans0, trans1, etc. in midicents (100 for an upper semiton, 200 for an upper ton, -400 for a lower major third, ...)

attribute.name: trans[index]
attribute.description: sets the transposition value of the [index] harmonizer in midicents [init=0:min=-2400:max=2400:step=0.001].
attribute.digest: sets the transposition value of the [index] harmonizer in midicents

attribute.name: gain[index]
attribute.description: sets the gain of the [index] harmonizer in dB [init=0:min=-127:max=18:step=0.001].
attribute.digest: sets the gain of the [index] harmonizer in dB

attribute.name: winsize[index]
attribute.description: sets the window size of the [index] harmonizer [init=50:min=-0:max=127:step=0.001].
attribute.digest: sets the window size of the [index] harmonizer

method.name: trans[index]
method.description: sets the transposition value of the [index] harmonizer in midicents [init=0:min=-2400:max=2400:step=0.001].
